name: MalariaTestsForPlasmodiumSpeciesNucleicAcid
title: Malaria (Tests for Plasmodium species Nucleic Acid)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Plasmodium nucleic acid),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: component: Plasmodium nucleic acid),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
